page.title: 15Leisure Activities, Wootton.
page.content: We looked through the questionnaire we had sent out and found that swimming was the most popular sport followed by walking. Sewing was the most popular craft activity. Quite a few people liked horse riding and showing ponies and only three out of about sixty families mentioned no leisure activities at all. We were surprised at the large number of people who take part in active sports. In the future we would like to see more leisure centres for children and their families as the existing ones are too far away especially for people who cannot afford to run a car.
